title: ISic003303. Fragment of an epitaph
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---...---]
2ΕΤΗ  ΙΘ´[---......---]
3ΤΗΠΡΟΓ´[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text based on photograph

English translation

… (lived) for 19 years … (died) 3 days before …

Italian translation

… (visse) 19 anni … (morì) 3 giorni prima di …

commentary

The inscription is an epitaph: in the lacuna at the beginning of the inscription, there must have been the name of the deceased followed by the indication of the age (often in the participle form of ζάω). The date of death must have been introduced by a form of the verb τελευτάω (the present τελευτᾷ or the aorist ἐτελεύτησεν).

bibliography

  • 54.0914 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 214 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000028
